Fieldwork

I had the privilege to be part of more of a dozen fieldworks that spanned from North America, Europe, and Africa. My main focus has been on Triassic and Cretaceous rocks, which are key ages for the understanding of the origin and radiation of modern amniote groups. See my CV for further details.
